attributes.action: Make it compulsory for Darren Mackintosh to come to Europe on a 'lads' only holiday this easter
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We need Darren to liven up our annual easter holiday, he has come in the past although this time his wife is 'putting her foot down' and not letting him come. Last year in New york his 'banter' was second to none, help support our holiday and vote for the motion.
 I am sure a good turn out from the public will help persaude him to come.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
